Mortal Kombat - Onslaught

Role - Associate Game Designer

I'm a game designer at NetherRealm Studios working on an upcoming Mortal Kombat mobile game. I'm working mainly as a combat designer in Unreal Engine 5. FATALITY!

dog (Bao Edition)

Role - Solo Development

WindWalker

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

Windwalker is a 3d turn-based RPG where players collect loot from combat and other encounters to cleanse the plague stirring in the fantastical world of Qubis. Enjoy a hand-crafted world, thousands of unique items & creatures and acquire powerful pets to fight alongside you.

UnityPCDesign
Factory Reset

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

Factory Reset is a PC Hack and Slash ARPG created for a Game Jam with a crafting system, and thousands of loot options.

Deathfall Wolfpine

Role - Game Designer/Programmer

DFWP is a PvP Arena prototype game using Unity and Photon PUN2 featuring high fidelity graphics in the HDRP render pipeline.

Elwood was my first 3d project in Unity. It is a turn-based RPG prototype with unique skills.
